data.text: Kamaghɨn amizɨ, nan adarasi, kɨ Godɨn apangkuvir ekiam gɨnɨghnɨgha, kamaghɨn ia gakaghori: Ia uari uan inivafɨziba isɨ angamɨra itir ofan mɨn God danɨngvɨra ikɨ. Egh a baghvɨra ikɨva an ingangarim damu. Egh ia God damutɨ, a bizir kam bagh bar akuegham. Ia uari isɨ God danɨngamin arazir kam, kar guizɨn arazir Godɨn ziam fem.

12:2 Efesus 1:18; 4:23; 5:10; 5:17; Kolosi 1:21; 1 Pita 1:14; 1 Jon 2:15Ia nguazir kamɨn itir gumazamiziba amir arazibar gɨn mangan markɨ. Ia teghtɨma God nɨghnɨzir igiaba ia danɨngtɨ ia arazir igiabar amuam. Kamaghɨn, ia Godɨn ifongiam gɨfogham, a kamakɨn: ia arazir aghuiba, ko God bar akongezir araziba, ko arazir bar deragha arazir mabagh afiraziba, ia dagh fogham.

God uan apangkuvimɨn gɨn ghua ingangarim damuasa bizir aghuim na ganɨngizɨ, kɨ vaghvagha kamaghɨn ia mɨkɨmasa. Ia uari fɨva pɨn uari arɨghan markɨ. Ia deragh nɨghnɨghɨva, God ia ganɨngizir nɨghnɨzir gavgavimɨn ganɨva, tuavir kamɨn ia uari tuisɨgh.
12:4 Efesus 4:1612:4-5 1 Korin 12:12E fo, inivafɨzir vamɨra itima, an aven soroghafariba ko bizir maba sara iti. Ezɨ inivafɨzir kamɨn aven itir bizir kaba, vaghvagha ingangarir igharazibagh ami.

12:5 1 Korin 12:27; Efesus 4:25Kamaghɨra, e gumazamizir avɨriba ikia, datɨrɨghɨn Krais ko porogha inivafɨzir vamɨran mɨn oto. Egha inivafɨzir kamɨn aven itir bizir kabar mɨn, e uari inigha Kraisɨn poroghav iti.

12:6 1 Korin 12:28; 13:2; 1 Pita 4:10-1112:6-8 1 Korin 12:4-11Kamaghɨn amizɨ, God uan apangkuvimɨn gɨn ghua ingangaribar amuasa fofoziba isa mati bizir aghuibar mɨn vaghvagha e ganɨngi. Eghtɨ gumazitam o amizitam, Godɨn akam inigha izir fofozim ikɨva, a uan nɨghnɨzir gavgavimɨn mɨrara deravɨra Godɨn akamɨn gun me mɨkɨmam.

12:7 Aposel 13:1; Galesia 6:6; 1 Timoti 5:17Eghtɨ gumazim o amizim igharazibar akurvaghamin fofozim ikɨva, a deravɨra men akurvagh. Eghtɨ gumazim o amizim igharazibar sure damuamin fofozim ikɨva, a deravɨra men sure damu.

12:8 Aposel 15:32; 20:28; 2 Korin 9:7; 1 Pita 5:2Eghtɨ gumazim o amizim gavgavim igharaz darazir navibar anɨngamin fofozim ikɨva, a bar deravɨra ingangarir kam damu. Eghtɨ gumazim o amizim biziba isa gumazamizibagh anɨdir fofozim ikɨva, an avɨriba me danɨng. Eghtɨ gumazim o amizim ingangarimɨn faragha zuir fofozim ikɨva, a deravɨra an apengan itir gumazamizibar ganɨva ingangarir kam damu. Eghtɨ gumazim o amizim igharaz darazir apangkuvamin fofozim ikɨva, a men apangkuvsɨ bar akongegh mamaghɨra ikɨ.
Ia ifar gumazamizibagh ifongan markɨ, ia uan navir averiabar aven guizɨn gumazamizibagh ifongegh. Egh arazir kurabar aghuaghɨva, arazir aghuibar suiragh gavgafigh.

12:10 Filipai 2:3; Hibru 13:1; 1 Pita 1:22; 2 Pita 1:7Ia uan ikɨzimɨn aven uari uarigh ifongezɨ moghɨn, ia uaghan Kraisɨn adarazir aven uari uarigh ifongegh. Egh ia zurara uarira uan ziaba pɨrafɨsɨ pamtem ingar.
12:11 Aposel 18:25; Akar Mogomem 3:15Ia pamten ingarɨva amɨrvaghan markɨ, Godɨn Duam ian navibar amutɨ ia zurara Ekiamɨn ingangarim damusɨ naviba dɨkavam.

12:12 Aposel 2:42; 1 Tesalonika 5:16-17; Hibru 3:6; 10:36; Jems 1:4Egh ia, bizir aghuir ia fogha iniamiba bagha mɨzua itiba, da bagh nɨghnɨgh bar akongegh. Egh osɨmtɨziba izamin dughiamɨn, ia ikɨ uaghan da aterɨva tugh gavgavigh, egh zurara God ko mɨkɨm.
Eghtɨ Godɨn gumazamiziba biziba puvatɨghtɨ, bizir ia itiba men akurvagh. Egh nguibar igharazimɨn gumazamiziba ian bighan izamin dughiamɨn, ia me inigh uan dɨpenibar mangɨ deragh me damu.
12:14 Matyu 5:44; Luk 6:28; Aposel 7:60; 1 Korin 4:12; 1 Pita 3:9Gumazim o amizim arazir kuramɨn nɨ damightɨ, nɨ arazir aghuimɨn a damusɨ Godɨn azangsɨgh. Egh a gasɨghasɨghsɨ Godɨn azangsɨghan markɨ.
12:15 Onger Akaba 35:13Ia igharaz darazi bar akongeghtɨ ia me ko bar akongegh. Egh igharaz darazi osemeghtɨ, ia me ko osemegh.

12:16 Onger Akaba 131:1-2; Aghuzir Akaba 3:7; Aisaia 5:21; Rom 11:20; 15:5Ia arazir vabara, gumazamiziba bar me damu. Egh uarira uari fan markɨ. Ia gumazamizir ziaba puvatɨzibar namakabar amu. Kamaghɨn uabɨ gɨnɨghnɨghan markɨ, kɨrara fofozim iti.
Gumazitam o amizitam arazir kuratamɨn nɨ damightɨma, nɨ uam arazir kuramɨn a ikarvaghan markɨ. Puvatɨ. Ia zurara gumazamizibar damazimɨn arazir aghuibar amu.
Ia uari navir amɨrizim ikɨva gumazamizir igharaziba ko navir vamɨra ikɨsɨ pamtem ingar.

12:19 Godɨn Araziba 32:35; Aghuzir Akaba 24:29; Matyu 5:39; Rom 12:17; 13:4; Hibru 10:30Nan namakar aghuiba, me arazir kuram ia damightɨ, ia men arazir kuram ikarvaghan markɨ. Ia teghtɨ, God uabɨ uan anɨngagharimɨn tuavimɨn me ikarvagham. Ia fo, Godɨn Akɨnafarimɨn aven en Ekiam kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Arazir kuraba ikarvaghamin ingangarim, kar nan bizim. Kɨ uabɨ men arazir kuraba ikarvagh egh ivezir kuraba me danɨngam.”

12:20 Ua Me Ini 23:4-5; Aghuzir Akaba 25:21-22; Matyu 5:44Nɨ Godɨn Akɨnafarim mɨkemezɨ moghɨn damu, “Nɨn apanim, mɨtiriam an aghɨtɨ, nɨ daghem a danɨng. Egh kuarim an pɨrtɨ, nɨ dɨpatam a danɨng. Nɨn arazir aghuir kamɨn a damightɨ, a uan arazir kuram gɨnɨghnɨgh bar aghumsɨgham.”
Nɨ arazir kuram ateghtɨ, a nɨ gafighan markɨ. Nɨ arazir aghuim damutɨ, nɨn arazir kam arazir kuram abɨragh a gafiragham.
